'''Alexander''' was a [[Netherese]] [[arcanist]] who taught at the [[Academy of Mentalist Study]] in [[Eileanar]] shortly before its destruction in {{yearlinkConvert|3520|NY}}.
document_data.Activities: Alexander was the foremost expert on the effects of [[necromantic]] magic, and applied this to teaching at the Academy under Dean [[Zucchi]].
